summary: Cleaned 16 linter warnings across 3 Metalogic files: removed redundant definition in TaskFrame.lean, added omit clauses in WorldHistory.lean, combined intro tactics and removed unused simp arguments in SoundnessLemmas.lean

artifacts.summary: Implementation summary for linter warning fixes

completion_data.completion_summary: Eliminated 16 linter warnings from TaskFrame.lean, WorldHistory.lean, and SoundnessLemmas.lean through mechanical refactorings: removed a redundant structure field definition, added omit clauses for unused section variables, combined consecutive intro tactics, and removed unused simp arguments.
